MajorClaims.MC1: aiding poor countries has positive effects, overweighing its side-effects for the several reasons
MajorClaims.MC2: being a global neighbor by aiding poor countries would be continues by many organizations and volunteers, and it will make the earth a better place to live

Claims.C1: there are abovementioned three key points of positive effects of aid; supporting poor countries to make its economy strong and building humane concepts to people, keeping strong global economy
Claims.C2: just giving aid to impoverished countries could be manipulated by big power countries
Claims.C3: a great amount of materials and money have poor countries being corrupted and politically dependent on other countries
Claims.C4: Aiding help poor countries in this situation solve their economical problems and run their own business
Claims.C5: aiding campaign gives a chance to considerate about poor people
Claims.C6: the campaigns might include practical benefits

Premises.P1: poor counties suffer from shortage of basic materials and facilities to start businesses and make it richer
Premises.P2: To be out of poverty, it is fundamental to support basic industry related factors such as light, electricity, load, highways, natural resources, technology and buildings for companies
Premises.P3: republic of Korea used to be the poorest country even compared to others in Africa in 1960's
Premises.P4: Now that it has became strong economy country aiding poor countries after 10 years of aid from other counties
Premises.P5: If people in rich countries ponder poor people suffering from poverty and diseases, they would never take their abundance for granted
Premises.P6: It not only raises the notice the meaning of harmony and love, but also be a good chance to learn humane doctrine of globalization
Premises.P7: In globalized world, the economies of several countries are in a big network and must influence on each others
Premises.P8: When America mortgage loan system went bad, several economies of European and Asian countries fluctuated, even any countries had to be gotten international supports to block its bankrupt
